campaign.story:
Tam'nýer—a' began being developed on July 6th, 2017 as a way to cope with the impending loss of my Papa (Dad) who was in hospital at the time with terminal cancer. My Papa brought me up loving nature and those around me, and that love truly blossoms with Tam'nýer—a'. It is a dedication to him, and the beauty of our diverse world transmogrified into a role-playing Fantasy World.
In the past 3 years, what was only supposed to be a ship in some far off land as a platform for role-play evolved into this massive world that now 30 some-odd people across the world partake in. Along the way, Dorian came on the scene and soon fell in love with the world and was quick to become a collaborator. With her innate sense of creativity and spiritualism Tam'nýer—a' has only grown, and now is so much bigger than myself. 
Map of Tam'nýer—a'
With Tam'nýer—a' being a world originally designed solely for role-play, it has grown far beyond that box. With its Gods, Goddesses and being a world ripe with superstitions, the calling to make an Oracle Deck using the deities has been a natural evolution of our creative & spiritual process.
Now, you might be wondering things like:
What is an Oracle Deck?
What do the deities of Tam'nýer—a' have to do with the real world?
What does it include?
How much will the deck cost?
When can I expect it?
These are all really great questions, and I'll do my best to give you a quick run down to answer all of these.

               First things first;
 Chances are you've heard of Tarot and probably know what a Tarot Deck is. Tarot is a spiritual belief and 'fortune telling' tool comprised of 72 cards. Out of these 72 cards there is a Major Arcana and a Minor Arcana. The Major Arcana is where we get the popular cards - the ones you've probably heard about like 'The Fool' or 'The Hermit' or that dreaded Tower card! 

               An Oracle Deck is very similar to Tarot in the way that it is a deck of cards that deal with the metaphysical and help you sort out life's big questions. However, the key difference is that an Oracle deck can be whatever you want it to be, and how big you want it to be. It doesn't have a Minor Arcana that consists of Cups, Wands, Sword and Pentacles, and it's cards can be listed as whatever the creator of said deck wants it to be. 

               There are hundreds of Oracle decks out there, just like different stylizations of traditional Tarot, so you might find yourself wondering "How do I know which one to get?" and the answer is actually really simple. It's whatever you feel drawn to. Think of it like trusting your gut instinct, or being 'pulled' to a particular piece of jewelry in a store. It's the same idea. If you feel a resonance with a deck, that's probably a sign that this might be the one for you and we hope that as you read on that you might feel a pull towards ours: Tam'nýer—a', a Fantasy Oracle. But just in case you don't, that's okay too.
Jn & Nue's cards facing each other
Now this answer might get a bit tricky and long winded, so buckle up and get ready!
Tam'nýer—a' itself is a fantasy world that is incredibly spiritual and stalwart. In the official lore most of all the Gods & Goddesses are considered to be dead, and yet people still worship the gods and give offerings. Where there is doubt, superstitions have crept in to take place and help act as guiding tools for the people there. In fact, reading cards, just like this Oracle Deck we are trying to make, would be a replica of the cards we envision the denizens of Tam'nýer—a' using to tell their fortunes and try to get clarity with their paths, be it their life path or their spiritual one. However, in Tam'nýer—a', we refer to this as "making your own tapestry."
Every single God and Goddess plays an important role in representing a factor of life, or the world around us, and it is as intricate as the real world that we live in. There is good, and there is bad, but all of it helps us in our journey. Without it, we would not be who we are right now, in this moment. The same is believed in Tam'nýer—a'. There is very little that is different between this fantasy world crafted as a role-play platform and ours, as Tam'nýer—a' is inspired by the multi-faceted world we have created around us over time; diverse cultures & extraordinary peoples. 

               That being said, I invite you to check out Tam'nýer—a''s Gods and Goddesses and see for yourself the intricacies of the belief system here, and get an understanding of what they represent and how they can, not only effect you, but help you in your journey; in making your own tapestry.

               For the sake of the Kickstarter and understanding that you are probably not at all familiar with Tam'nýer—a', I am going to be focusing on the three gods colloquially known as Y'ljnöx; they are the gods of Love, Friendship & Possession, and to help get you acquainted I will refer to them as we go on and to give you a taste of what this deck has in store for you.
Examples of our Cards; Gods & Goddesses Nue, VuF, Q'Tam'sma, Nyer-a', Y'l, Jn & Ox
In Tam'nýer—a', the 32 Gods and Goddesses are viewed as transcendent truth. They define the world, their stories are eternal, and they touch and resonate with us as only myths can do. Their lessons are profound and multi-layered; they are compelling for the spiritual truth-seeker and the mundane-preoccupied alike. In other words, the perfect guides on our soul journey, allowing us to meditate and discover ourselves in all our beautiful complexity, but also to co-create our paths; make our own tapestry.

               As everything, especially when it comes to mythos, they can be left open to interpretation individual to individual, but ultimately there lies a fundamental lesson. The Divine Family, in which Y'ljnöx are the sons, is where it all starts to trickle down.

               To give you a quick understanding, on one fine evening when the brothers regaled whilst drinking, Jn decided to prank his brothers, but this time he would take it much too far and seal their fates. He decided that out of a bit of fun, he would sneak into their parents' room and take a piece of their heart. To Jn, this was not only fun, but a way to express love to both his brothers, both older and younger than himself; Y'l and Öx. 

               Without telling his siblings what it was, he merely offered it as something for them to try, and knowing that it was their parents' heart, which consequently must be love for them, why not get high on it? So they did! The unsuspecting brothers tore it apart into little pieces and proceeded to smoke it. Jn, took part, of course, but not as much because he was much more excited to see the effects take hold, especially considering that he was expecting to watch his brothers become elated as they would no doubt be filled with love, admiration and gratitude.

               However, that was not to be the case at all. Soon after, Y'l and Öx became ill. Something was terribly wrong, and while Jn hadn't smoked too much, he wasn't feeling the best either. Lucky for Jn, he could leave the room with his life. His brothers were not so blessed as that as they laid there on the floor, bereft of life. 

               You see, the issue was that they already possessed their parents' love and that their parent's heart was not something that they had rights to take and alter. Them extinguishing the piece of heart for their own pleasure and enjoyment that was not their own showed a fatal level of greed.

               Ah, but what happened to Jn? Well, of course he had to tell his parents eventually, and with that came full circle. Out of anger and heartbreak, Sea & Sky, their parents, killed their only remaining son, and with that, Jn's body fell down to Tam'nýer—a', and breaking apart on impact, his body became the various land masses of the world. Soon, overtaken by grief, Q'Tam'šmă, the Goddess of the Sea, laid down and held the broken body of her son, and unable to leave her, Nýer—a', the God of the Sky, laid beside her, to never leave her alone with her grief which consumed her on account of their own hasty actions.
 
               As you can tell, there are many lessons and various meanings to our tales, and these profound sentiments are reflected in our Oracle Deck even beyond just the cards, but the 8 exclusive spreads we have designed solely for it as well.
No matter where you are, or what race happens to tickle your fancy, the Gods & Goddesses of Tam'nýer—a' are paramount. This Kickstarter is to help bring them back to life in our own way; to honour them with proper art and a well-thought out Oracle Deck.
The Tam'nýer—a' Fantasy Oracle deck can be used both for mundane readings and spiritual ones, complete with exclusive spreads for readings as well.
Mundane Readings focus is on the tangible world, relationships, what is outside of us. Having a challenge or a personal issue, healing, trauma, would also be Mundane, in the sense of ordinary life, daily life. These Spreads are simple layouts depending on the type of question: the Tapestry (featured below), the Journey, United (Lovers), and the New Life, a customary reading to have for a child. Readings for other persons than the querent are strongly discouraged, with the exception of the New Life reading.
The Tapestry Spread, two versions
You will note that the Tapestry Spread, which is inspired by VüƑ, the God of Time, also allows for an unfocused option; this is on purpose. When life is hectic, we don't simply have just one problem, and often we don't know what to deal with first. These are the times when we could use guidance the most!
In Spiritual Readings the focus is inward always, but also on reaching out and communing with the Gods (if they resonate with you), or reaching out (or rather, upwards) and communing with Spirit on our journey to enlightenment. These Spreads are are another four layouts known as The Guide, Redemption, Truth Seeker, and the VüƑ and Vojshā Spread which is used when the only two Gods who are still deemed alive are asked for guidance.
The Guide Spread
For you, the reader, the Tam'nýer—a' Fantasy Oracle deck offers a fresh and unconventional perspective, the possibility to tap into inspiration unencumbered by centuries of history. If the images and stories speak to you, if you find them as compelling as we did, then this may be the Oracle Deck you were looking for. The layouts are there to guide you, and they could all be read for mundane matters as well as spiritual, but you could also use the cards and the beautiful images themselves for meditation and contemplation.
 Our reward tiers include something for everyone:
All 32 cards of the Oracle Deck will feature art done by Yayu @artofyayu — which is the bulk of what this Kickstarter hopes to achieve — with the backs of each card designed by myself and my co-creator Dorian Moreau to incorporate the symbol of the belief of Numerology in Tam'nýer—a', which ties into the Gods themselves. In choosing Yayu for the art, and freedom of artistic interpretation, I could not be happier as she has a knack and history of depicting mythological motifs; a huge reason why we chose her. 
For collectors, we also have a limited edition tier:
In addition to the art, this campaign is designed to cover the production costs to make the Oracle Deck a physical reality and tied to that are also the Stretch Goals, but we'll get to those in a moment.
The Oracle Deck will include:
Blue Core Standard - 280 gsm (Finish Type; Lamination)
Tuck Box; varnish; gloss finish
Instructions*; printed in Black & White; 24 pgs
*The Instructions are what each card means when you do your readings as well as the 8 exclusive spreads designed for the deck itself.
Furthermore, we will be getting our Oracle Deck printed by PrintNinja!
By printing our deck with PrintNinja, we're not only getting a great product, but supporting a company that supports other Kickstarters as well. It's a win-win and it's an honour to work with them.
They offer fantastic service and our base minimums of printing with them (as well as shipping the lot to me) for 500 decks is $3,228.41
*Please note that these prices are in USD and that I, Nicholas Sébastien reside in Canada, so I have rounded up the CAD exchange to make certain that I will have enough to transfer into USD when concerning the Goal and the unlocked prices for our Stretch Goals
 Making our TOTAL BASE GOAL = US$ 14,367.82 (roughly 20k CAD)
This brings us to—
 The Oracle Deck itself will be $55 CAD

               Right now, according to XE.com for a conversion rate of 1 USD = 1.34 CAD, that makes the deck approximately $41 USD

*Please note that these prices do not include shipping and that the exchange rate fluctuates. Thankfully Kickstarter will adjust to your personal currency.
 Because the world is a bit topsy-turvy right now, and we never really know when things could potentially get worse or better, we are setting an expectation date of delivery in August of 2021. Now, do understand that that this isn't merely a production date, but a delivery date.
You should have the Tam'nýer—a', a Fantasy Oracle by the end August 2021 at the latest. We have also listed delivery this far in the future as we have received word that there have been delays with PrintNinja production due to COVID-19.
That being said, rest assured that I will keep you informed every bit of the way with frequent updates as far as the completion of art and production goes, and when I will be shipping out your deck as well!

The Stretch Goals of our Kickstarter project are to ultimately transform the Tam'nýer—a', a Fantasy Oracle into a true work of art.

Still want to know more about the Deck? Keep reading! 
We wanted to give you more of a peek into our process and help you understand the deck better if you wanted to know. 
If, however, you're satisfied, you don't need to keep reading below. :D
Let's give you an example of a popular Mundane Reading next! In the United (Lovers) Spread, four cards are drawn and laid out in a single row, guidance sought when one is ready to take a further step with a lover. Only four cards of the Oracle Deck, The Lovers (Y'l, Jn & Öx and Nue) are used, and the meaning of the reading attaches to the order of the cards first and foremost. 
Sample reading of the United (Lovers) Spread
Here is a breakdown of what we have designed for them and how they should be interpreted when doing a reading:
Cards 6,7,8 & 9 - The Lovers (Y'l, Jn & Öx, Nue - 4 cards, Nue is considered to balance out the negative of the Y'l, Jn & Öx cards, although not entirely)
Y'l - friendship, platonic love, the beginning of a new relationship (as lovers, friends or even business), crush or infatuation
Jn - lessons learned through suffering and loss, the perils of greed, jealousy and envy, obsession, destructive passions (cannot be reversed)
Öx - mature enduring love, marriage, balanced relationship, actively working towards such things
Nue, The Moon, God of Companionship - companionship, acceptance of others as they are, being faithful, unconditional love
In a Mundane reading, these cards are almost always interpreted according to the meanings above in the context of relationships, with Jn considered a challenging card, and Nue being considered a positive beneficial card (except when reversed, when it may signify that the querent is taken for granted or stuck in a toxic relationship).
  If two or more of the Lovers cards appear together in a reading, then the querent must resolve a situation revolving around relationships and which has the potential of becoming highly destructive. Nue remains a beneficial card, but Jn and either Y’l or Öx or both is considered a disastrous combination.
  Equally negative is a reading where the Q'Tam'šmă (Mother of All) and Jn appear together, in which case the querent is advised of potential karmic effects of their past or current actions. At the opposite, the Jn and Uu'krieuvan (Death) cards together could mean redemption from past misdeeds.

Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
By going with PrintNinja's Blue Core Standard cards and lamination process (unless we get our stretch goal, in which case Lamination will be changed to Varnish so that we can get gilded edges). 

This means that the cards will all be water resistant like normal playing cards and last for years to come. 

While we would generally want fully waterproof cards, we want to lower our impact on the environment and not print the cards in the offered PVC format, as PVC also cannot be recycled as a regular plastic.

This new Mythic line of Elder Dice is designed around three new arcane symbols, with the symbol replacing the highest value on each die. With this new line of Mythic Elder Dice, each set of polyhedral dice will have an additional d20 in each box, coming with ten dice total (two d20s, one d12, one d10, one d%, one d8, three d6, and one d4).
Each set comes packaged in a matching spellbook box with a magnetic closure, gold foil, spot gloss, and lore card. We also have sets of 9 six-sided dice as well as polyhedral booster packs that contain an extra 3d4, d6 and 2d10. We are also introducing our new ritual candle dice tubes that will look great on your shelf or at the gaming table. These candle tubes can hold up to ten dice and can also be used as a miniature dice cup for rolling in confined spaces.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are very excited to bring Elder Dice to the gaming community. It's a privilege to be entrusted by so many people to bring this project to life. We will work hard to make sure it is as smooth as can be. Together David and Heath have completed many Kickstarter campaigns. Each Kickstarter project brings many valuable lessons learned. Because of our experience, we feel very confident in our ability to deliver a quality product to you.

We have allotted time to finalize the project at the conclusion of the campaign, and then we will roll right into production. We have been working with our manufacturing partners in China for months on these Elder Dice designs to be sure the manufacturing process goes as smoothly as possible, however, making the new candle holder is something we have never done before. There is always the potential for delay when working with a new manufacturer. We have a strong relationship with our fulfillment partner. These relationships are incredibly important and give us confidence in our ability to deliver your rewards in a safe and economical manner.

However, with our experience, we know that unexpected issues can arise during the production process. Final preparations for manufacturing after the Kickstarter campaign could take longer than expected. There can be manufacturing delays that are beyond our control. When the product is inspected for quality control, a flaw could be found and a part may have to be remade. Molds may breakdown and have to be recreated. We will not sacrifice quality, even if it pushes the schedule back!

There can also be delays with shipping. Products can be delayed at sea, there may be extended customs inspections, and even adverse weather conditions may slow down local delivery. Deadly pandemics may strike, causing governments to shut down commerce either regionally or globally.

But, when you support Elder Dice, we promise to keep you up to date about its progress from the campaign’s close all the way to when the dice are shipped. As you can see from our previous campaigns, we regularly post updates. We will let you know the status of the project at regular intervals.

campaign.story:
[Traduction de la page en français - Translation of the page into French]
Le contenu ci-dessous est intégralement écrit en anglais. Pour mieux vous repérer, vous pourrez retrouver la traduction intégrale de toute la campagne Kickstarter à l’identique et en français à l’adresse suivante : https://www.arcanya.fr
Rassurez-vous, le nom des offres reste le même dans les deux langues, vous vous y retrouverez facilement.
 We all know that there are dark days, bad times, sorrows and sufferings which, however unbearable they may be, will not last forever. However, when the heart bleeds and becomes so heavy that our legs can no longer carry us, sometimes we forget it. Then you collapse in the dark, alone like drifting dust in the universe.
I created the Mornes Plaines of Arcanya to help those who go through life's trials not to forget it, and to remember that even in the darkest moments, each of us has an infinite source of light, and unsuspected resources to rise again, stronger and greater than we were before.
The world of Arcanya seems hopelessly lost. This is a kingdom where the abyss buries every living thing. The 4 elements, Earth (the Pentacles), Air (the Swords), Water (the Cups) and Fire (the Wands) have given way to Stones, Wind, Rain and Ashes.
Yet it is a kingdom that belongs to you to cross, alongside the Magician, Justice, the Emperor or the Star to explore your own universe, to mobilize your own forces and your own resources, whose existence you have sometimes forgotten. You are the only person capable of repelling your Darkness. Have faith in yourself, and soon the Sun will illuminate again the Mornes Plaines of Arcanya.
Here is an extract from the sublime symphonic orchestration composed by Lisa Van Hal, and a small note from soloist singer Julie Elven, who will sing on the main theme of Arcanya.
PLAY

Julie Elven is a soundtrack and filmscore vocalist. She has contributed as a soloist to major video games such as Horizon Zero Dawn, League of Legends, World of Warcraft, Hearthstone, Honor of Kings, Star Citizen, Tomb Raider and more. In 2017, Julie was selected to perform The Hanging Tree solo from The Hunger Games movie.
PLAY

The booklet includes French and English translations from the outset.
Don't worry : Strength will wear its traditional number (11) and Justice the 8.
 These cards illustrate the Stretch goal 2 : "free addition of the inverted Strength and Justice cards".
The remaining cards have already been studied and designed, but having them drawn by Anna represents an important workload, in terms of time and means, which only the project funding will be able to complete.
The Sacred Grimoire of the High Priestess, an authentic and imposing 220-page book, created by hand (see video below). You can order your copy at the same time as the deck (10 books available).
PLAY

 (Sold without frame)
The longest side of a sticker will measure 3,15′
– Why propose a €25,000 project and set a first funding target at €18,000 ? –

    The minimum objective of €18 000 will not allow the creation of the entire Arcanya universe, in its luxurious version and with its soundtrack, but it will allow the project to exist in a standard version, even if the initial objective is not reached. You will be able to have your deck in hand, with its 78 cards and its astounding atmosphere.
To show you the prices in dollars, the amounts in euros have been converted at the time of the campaign launch. Slight variations may occur until final settlement. In case of doubt, only the amounts in euros are authentic.
When you choose an offer, you will still be able to modify the amount you wish to donate (see the image above). You will not be able to give less, but you can always give more. This is the system that will allow you to add the options you want.
Example 1 : If you have chosen the Asabel Pledge (i.e. the deck + the 3 exclusive cards for 89€/$100), but you want to add the novel and 3 posters, you will just have to add the price of the novel (+17€/$20) and the price of 3 posters (12€ x 3 = +36€/$40) to the normal price of the chosen offer (89€ + 17€ +36€ = 142€/$160). You will then have to select the Asabel Pledge and indicate an amount of 142€. (Reminder : the best offer, the “all-inclusive” pack, is 119€/$132 for 48 hours)
Example 2 : You don’t want to buy the game, but you would still like the novel and the soundtrack ? As options are available for all offers, you can select the Hildmar Pledge (8€) and add +17€ (novel) and +15€ (soundtrack). You will therefore need to choose the Hildmar Pledge and indicate an amount (8€+17€+15€) of 40€/45$.
YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SPECIFY THE POSTERS YOU WANT AND ALL THE DETAILS OF YOUR COMMITMENT AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN IN THE PLEDGE MANAGER. IT IS ALSO AT THIS STAGE THAT THE SHIPPING COSTS WILL BE ADDED.
For estimations, the shipping costs will be about 5€ (without taxes) for recipients located in France, about 10€ (without taxes) for recipients located in Europe, excluding the UK and Switzerland, and about 15€ (without taxes) for the other recipients. These amounts will be degressive from certain stretch goals, until they are free.
BONUS : as a bonus, here’s a short film / trailer that was directed by Sebastien Weiss and Nico Pfister Photography with LucioleS Cosplay, and which nicely illustrates the universe of Arcanya.
    Hope you’ll enjoy !

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
- The standard version Vs The Deluxe version :
The minimum objective of €18 000 will not allow the creation of the entire Arcanya universe, in its luxurious Deluxe version and with its soundtrack, but it will allow the project to exist in a standard version, even if the initial objective is not reached. You will be able to have your deck in hand, with its 78 cards and its astounding atmosphere.

- Delivery schedules :
Most of the manufacturing elements are under control and we believe we have estimated them as close as possible to reality. However, some elements are totally out of our control and could cause delays in delivery.

1) In 2021, the celebration of the New Moon (Chinese New Year) is scheduled for February 12, 2021. This date is an important celebration in China and industrial activities (including the printing of our cards) are suspended for 15 days. If we manage to ship the products before this date, there will be no consequence on the delivery times, otherwise, this holiday period will have to be taken into account.

2) Of course, our delivery schedule will depend on the evolution of COVID-19 in China and France, but also in your country of residence.

campaign.story:
"世界コスプレサミット(通称コスサミ)"は2003年に「名古屋」で始まり、今年の夏で18年目を迎える世界最大級のコスプレの祭典です。
 今では世界40の国と地域から30万人が集まる国際的なイベントです。しかし、コロナ禍の影響で18年続いてきた世界コスプレサミットが存続の危機にあります。
今までコスサミを支えて下さったスポンサー様が軒並みにこのコロナの影響を受けてダウン。(その多くが航空会社や観光産業の皆さま)
2020年はオフラインでのイベントを中止しました。このままでは、今後のイベント開催が出来なくなる可能性が非常に高いです。
 このままではコスサミが消えてしまう。。。
しかし世界にはコスサミを愛し、毎年の開催を楽しみにしているコスプレイヤーが大勢います。 そこで、2021年以降のイベント継続の為にクラウドファンディングを実施することを決意しました。
世界に散らばる日本の文化を愛する皆さん！
そんな日本を愛する海外の人を応援したいという日本の皆さん！
一つの力は小さくてもたくさん集まればそれは"存続の力"になります！
是非皆さんのご支援をよろしくお願い致します！
今回集まった支援は以下の用途にて活用させていただきます。
・日本への渡航費
・予選会実施の会場費、イベント制作費
・各国受け入れ費用(宿泊費、移動費、食費)
・会場費、イベント制作費

◯2020メモリアルモザイクアート参加プラン：¥1,100
1万人で作る世界コスプレサミット2020メモリアル支援モザイクアートへの参加権！あなたの写真が世界中の支援者の写真と繋がって、一つの絵になります！モザイクアートの元の絵はスタジオジブリなど多くの作品の背景美術を担当した増山修さんのスタジオ・インスパイアードが今回のためにチャリティーで作成してくれたWCSオリジナル背景画を使用。
出来上がったモザイクアートは皆さんにデータで差し上げると共に、巨大プリントをして、名古屋の玄関口である中部国際空港にメモリアルとして数年展示されます。是非、コスプレイヤーの方は宅コスの写真で参加ください。もちろんコスプレイヤー以外の方も参加できます。2020年を象徴するマスク姿で参加して頂ければ印象的な作品になるでしょう。
◯WCS2020オリジナルピンバッチプラン：¥8,800
WCS を支えたサポーターの証となるWCS2020オリジナルピンバッチをプレゼント。名古屋で開催されるWCS 各イベントのみならず、世界のWCS 関連イベントで着用し、特典を受けられます。
◯WCS2020オリジナルTシャツプラン：¥11,000
WCS を支えたサポーターの証となるWCS2020オリジナルTシャツをプレゼント。名古屋で開催されるWCS 各イベントのみならず、世界のWCS 関連イベントで着用し、特典を受けられます。

◯WCS応援プランC：¥110,000

 "世界コスプレサミット(通称コスサミ)"は2003年に「名古屋」で始まり、今年の夏で18年目を迎える世界最大級のコスプレの祭典です。コスプレの聖地名古屋で約1週間にかけて、大須商店街を使ったコスプレパレードや、名古屋のシンボルであるオアシス21でコスプレイベント、また、世界ナンバーワンのコスプレイヤーを決める世界コスプレチャンピオンシップなどが開催され、名古屋の夏を盛り上げます。
新しい国際交流を創造するため2003年に名古屋で誕生した世界コスプレサミット（WCS）。毎年WCSを開催するたびに海外からの加盟数は増え続け、いまや40もの国・地域がWCSに関わるほどに成長しました。
 メインイベントの１つ「世界コスプレチャンピオンシップ」は世界中のコスプレイヤーが出場を夢見るコスプレの世界大会です。本大会では、2名一組で、日本のマンガ、アニメ、ゲーム、特撮の作品のキャラクターのコスプレをします。大きく2つのポイントで競い合い、一つ目が自分たちで作成した「衣装」の出来栄え、二つ目が、2分30秒の中でその作品の世界を作り上げる「ステージパフォーマンス」になります。
「世界コスプレチャンピオンシップ」はコスプレのオリンピックや甲子園のようなものです。この大会に出場する為には各国で行われる予選会を勝ち抜きその国の代表コスプレイヤーになる必要があります。勝ち抜いたコスプレイヤーはその年の代表として来日し世界ナンバーワンのコスプレイヤーを目指しします。日々世界中のコスプレイヤーが「聖地＝日本・名古屋」に訪れることを夢見てコスプレ活動に励んでいます。日本はマンガやアニメの憧れの地だけに収まらず、コスプレの聖地と化しているのです。 

2019年参加国/Participating States in 2019
2019年優勝のオーストラリア表彰式の様子
世界コスプレサミットチャンピオンシップは、言うなればコスプレのオリンピックのようなものです。世界中の若者がこの大会に出場するために、時間、お金、労力をかけて、各国の予選会に挑んでいます。
あるコスプレイヤーは衣装の制作に1年もの時間を掛け準備し、
あるコスプレイヤーはパフォーマンスの練習のために遠く離れたパートナーの元に通い、
あるコスプレイヤーは電気・ガスを止められても衣装にお金を掛け、パートナーの家に一緒に住んでこの大会に挑みます。
また、前年の代表が翌年の代表に自分の技術や経験を伝え、国一丸となって代表を応援します。そうやって、コスプレイヤーの夢の場所として18続いて来たのが世界コスプレサミットです。
漫画やアニメという好きなもので繋がっているからこそ、国の壁、言葉の壁、人種の壁、人種の壁が越えられます。
大会終了後の温泉旅行では、みんなで浴衣を来てカラオケ大会を実施。
アニソンをみんなで日本語で大合唱する様子はまさに世界平和そのもので、それが日本の文化である漫画やアニメが作り出したことを感じられる一瞬でもあります。
バックグラウンドの異なる40を超える国と地域が一同に会するこの奇跡のような時間。
このような仲間は一生ものの仲間となって大会終了後も連絡を取り合い、その絆を深めていっています。我々はこの毎年増える代表をアラムナイと呼び、その数は累計で600人ほどとなっています。
世界コスプレサミット加盟国である国と地域もこのコロナ禍で、イベントの自粛要請、経済のストップによってイベントの実施が難しい状況にあります。各国オーガナイザーとも連携を取りながら、「来年、1ヶ国も欠けることなく、世界コスプレサミット2021を開催する。」という目標を達成するために、WCSファミリー一丸になってこのプロジェクトに取り組むことを決意しました。
 我々は年に一度のこのコスプレサミットの場を守りたい。18年続いたこの世界コスプレサミットの火を絶やしたくないと切に願っています。少しでも構いません！皆さん一人ひとりの支援がたくさん集まればそれは"存続の力"になります！
是非皆さんのご支援をよろしくお願い致します！
コスプレサミット開催の影の立役者の一つとしておもてなし学生実行委員会がいます。毎年世界中から集まってくる各国代表のコスプレイヤーたち。中には日本どころか、海外に来るのも初めてだとう世界のコスプレイヤーたちがいます。コスプレの聖地に来れてワクワクした気持ちと、言語も通じず不安な気持ちを抱えて日本にやって来ます。そんな日本での滞在をもっと楽しんでもらいたいとおもてなし学生実行委員会設立されました。コスプレイヤーと共に闘うもう一つの物語がここにはあります。
今回WCSが存続の危機ということを聞きつけて、応援アンバサダーに名乗りを上げてくれた人物がいます。今まで400近くのコスプレ衣装を制作し、世界中のWCS予選でも審査員をしてきた、作家やデザイナーとしても大活躍のコスプレイヤーヤヤハンさんです。これからもこのコスプレ文化を守るために、そしてコスプレサミットを目指すコスプレイヤーのために力になりたいと立ち上がってくれました！
WCS Campaign Ambassador - Yaya Han

PLAY

こんにちは。世界コスプレサミット実行委員長の小栗徳丸です。2003年に世界コスプレサミットを立ち上げてから18年、様々な困難を乗り越えてここまで続けて来ました。参加の国と地域も40を超えて、今では名古屋の夏の風物詩の一つになりました。名古屋・愛知の皆様、また世界中のジャパンポップカルチャーに支えられてここまで大きくなったコスサミです。本当に感謝しております。
この火を消してはいけないと今年はこのコロナ禍にオンラインでの開催を決めましたが、2021年の実施がこのままでは難しいです。各国の代表になるには、その国の地域予選を勝ち抜くために何年もチャレンジするコスプレイヤーがおり、世界中の多くのコスプレイヤーの憧れの場所を守りたいというその一心です。一人ひとりの小さなが支援がこの文化を繋ぐ一歩になります。これからもっともっと皆様に恩返しをするためにも是非、この危機を乗り切るためにご支援頂けますと幸いです。
＜作品：井上ハヤオキ＞ グラフィックレコーディングにて実行委員長小栗の想いを制作して頂きました。
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
WCS2020オリジナルTシャツ、ピンバッチの発送が遅れる場合がございます。
WCS2021がオフラインでの実施が難しい場合は、オンラインでの開催になる場合がございます。
その場合もエンドロールは作成致します。
中部国際空航空での2020メモリアルモザイクアートの掲載期間が場合によっては短くなる場合がございます。
Shipping of the WCS2020 original T-shirts and pin badges may experience delays.
It is possible that WCS2021 may be celebrated as an online event, in the case that the celebration of a physical event would be deemed unfeasible.
In this case a credit roll would be produced regardless.
The period of exhibition of the 2020 Memorial Mosaic Art collage at the Chubu International Airport may be shorter depending on airport related circumstances or otherwise.
El envío de las camisetas originales WCS2020 y los pines puede sufrir retrasos. Es posible que WCS2021 pueda celebrarse como un evento en línea, en caso de que la celebración de un evento físico se considere inviable. No obstante, la lista de créditos se produciría de todas formas. El período de exposición del Mosaico Memorial 2020 en el Aeropuerto Internacional de Nagoya podría acortarse dependiendo de las circunstancias.

support.title: モザイクアート参加/participat in the Mosaic Art
support.descp:
1万人で作る世界コスプレサミット2020メモリアル支援モザイクアートへの参加権！あなたの写真が世界中の支援者の写真と繋がって、一つの絵になります！モザイクアートの元の絵はスタジオジブリなど多くの作品の背景美術を担当している増山修さんが今回のためにチャリティーで作成してくれたWCSオリジナル背景画を使用。
出来上がったモザイクアートは皆さんにデータで差し上げると共に、巨大プリントをして、名古屋の玄関口である中部国際空港にメモリアルとして数年展示されます。
You earn the right to participate in the World Cosplay Summit 2020 Memorial Support Mosaic Art made by ten thousand persons! Your picture will be together with the pictures of backers from all over the world to create a single image! The illustration used as the base for the mosaic art will be a WCS original background created for this occasion as a special charity work by Osamu Masuyama, a background artist famous for his participation in many works including some from Studio Ghibli.
The completed mosaic art is to be sent in digital form to the backers, and also a large-sized print will be exposed for several years as a memorial at the Chubu International Airport, the gateway to Nagoya.
INCLUDES:
2020メモリアルモザイクアート参加/Participation in the 2020 Memorial Mosaic Art

【WCSオリジナルオタク旅行(日本orWCS予選会)】
世界どこからでも2名に日本旅行を提供します。旅行時期は2021~2022年です。（オリンピック期間は除く）
10日旅行で飛行機チケットと宿泊を提供します。名古屋を初め、全国のオタク旅行ポイントを追加する予定です。（ジブリスタジオなど）
日本人の方が支援して頂いた場合は、アメリカのアニメエキスポ、オーストラリアのオタク旅行などを提供します。
渡航先はお選びください！
- オーストラリア（スマッシュ)
- アメリカ（アニメエキスポ）
- アジアでのWCSイベント
- ヨーロッパでのWCSイベント
- 中南米でのWCSイベント
- 南アフリカでのWCSイベント
※ビザの取得はご自身でお願いします。
※詳細はご支援後にキックスターターを通してご連絡をさせて頂きます。
【WCS Original Dream Travel（Around Japan or to a WCS preliminary contest）】
A dream filled trip for two people to Japan from anywhere around the world. The trip is valid during the year of 2021 and 2022 (outside of the planned Olympic Games time period)
This will be a 10 day trip covering flights and accommodation. Nagoya will be the starting point, and we will add otaku points of interest around the country (Studio Ghibli etc).
※Visa application fee is not included.
※We will keep in contact with those who make this pledge through the Kickstarter platform.
INCLUDES:
WCSオリジナルオタク旅行/WCS Original Dream Travel

campaign.story:
Previous Issues of Hazel: II, III, and IV
For modern witches looking for a quiet companion through the trials of the digital age, Hazel is a witches’ lifestyle zine, the kind of mini magazine we imagine Kiki reading in the world of the Ghibli movie Kiki’s Delivery Service. Sitting down at a quiet cafe to peruse the latest comics about the daily life of a magic user, articles about centering oneself, and DIYs for new ways to incorporate intention into your daily routine, Hazel offers kindly words of guidance and peace of mind in the midst of the busy pace of modern life.
Full of more wonderfully witchy content than ever, at 5.5" x 8.5", this 76-page issue is no exception to our dedication to bringing heartfelt and joyous stories and artwork into your hands. Hazel's enchanted forest atmosphere brings us to a place where every moment is full of magic to discover, and every day is a celebration.
This is the LAST year of Hazel! It's sad to let it go, but this is still a celebration for us to be able to put out one last issue full of wonder and serenity. We want to make it extra special by including all kinds of new merch, extra gifts as the campaign goes on, and maybe even some stretch goals...! 
Previous spreads from Issue IV
Our big dream stretch goal is to bring back Issue I of Hazel for reprinting. There were only 100 copies initially printed, and all but a few have sold out. The remainder are stowed away in the Cottonbook Press library. Although digital versions of the books have always been available, we've received many requests to bring back the physical copy of Issue I. If we get enough support this year, as a major stretch goal, we would love to produce at least 100 more copies for our readers. It would still be on the lighter white paper of the original book, but with a cover stock that matches issues 3, 4, and 5.
Hazel Issue I, currently out of print, which we're hoping to reprint this year if we surpass our goal
Why a zine? Zines, small circulation publications getting their name from the word "magazine," have always been a tool for those without means to get their ideas out into the world. We've had our amazing creators go out and have great successes after Hazel, even if all they needed from us was the confidence boost of seeing their first published work. In providing a space for underrepresented and beginning creators to show their talents and stories, we've been so proud to see former contributors go on to get book deals, launch illustration careers, and publish their own zines! 
Raising up the voices of underrepresented creators is one of the things we strive for with Hazel. Witch culture has been a haven for not only women who don't fit the mold, but also gender non-conforming people, trans people, and nonbinary people, and people of all races who identify as such. We celebrate that aspect in the making of this zine, bringing together all kinds of voices. Past issues have featured such incredible talents as Sudi Rouhi, Ragon Dickard, Tori Sharp, Jenny Park, and Sydney Anderson as well as budding new talent with clever ideas to share with our readership. These amazing artists, writers, and DIY instructors contribute beautiful and meaningful content year after year, elevating the emanations of our pages with each new issue. 
 Our stunningly talented team of magic-makers this year includes: 
Avina-kei
V. C. Slade
Victoria Leeder
Kasia K.
Lulu VanHoagland
Sydney Anderson
Allison Kupatt
Jennifer Chan
Pinceau Arc-en-Ciel
Natalia Lopes
littlemousedeer
Kucera Bishop
Kirsten Petersen
Penelopea
Petrina Cheng-Tatara
Lucy Kagan
Maxine Frizz
Jessica Mejias
Lara Smith
Caroline Humphrey
Thais Lopes
Ellenor Mererid
Melissa Brinks
Cody Tenaglia
Libby Reed
Thali Demeter
Thanks to our consistently charming and supportive readers, we have been able to lift up the voices of talented creators of diverse genders, creating a place for their work to shine in an often dark landscape. Our backers on Kickstarter have allowed these luminaries to glow even when marginalized creators often struggle to thrive in a system that pushes them to the background. An essential element of witchcraft is finding power in ourselves and our communities, where we have been told there is none. 
Sample pages by Caroline Humphries (left) and Jennifer Chan (right)
Sample pages by Maxine Frizz (left) and Natalia Lopes and Thais Lopes (right)
 Whether your magic is artwork, storytelling, coding, baking, or building, you have the power to make things that are greater than the sum of their parts. When we read and write Hazel, we have the opportunity to take part in a shared experience, an activity that connects us. Your support of Hazel is an act that strengthens us, and enhances the creative process. Together, we have magic.
When you back Hazel on Kickstarter, you are supporting that magic, participating in a give and take that rewards both sides. We have some beautiful extra gifts to share with you this year, and the more we are able to raise, the more rewards we'd love to add on!
 A Digital Copy of Hazel Issue V & the whole Hazel library as PDFs 
A physical copy of Hazel Issue V and the Hazel library (not including out-of-print Issue 1)
Our physical copies of the whole Hazel set will not include Issue I, which is currently out of print. If we can raise enough funds, we would love to reprint Hazel Issue I and be able to provide that option. What can you do to help us get there? 1. Back Hazel by pledging at any level to help us reach our funding goal. 2. Spread the word to friends, family, social media -- anyone you think would be interested! 3. Follow us on social media and give our posts some love (this will help us extend our reach and share Hazel with many many more!). 
Previous issue in physical form
Wooden Pins:
Hazel V wooden pin design & mockup
Last year's pins are pictured below to give you a sense of how this year's designs (above) will look in real life! 
Past wooden pin rewards
Commissions (Limited Availability):
Our highest tier, Patron of the Light Arts, allows you to support an artist directly from our enchanted trio of creators this year, Sydney Anderson, Cody Tenaglia, and Lucy Kagan. Wow, wait, let me amend that! The three slots quickly disappeared, so we added three new artists! Now, Lulu VanHoagland, Lara Smith, and Pinceau Arc-en-Ciel join our group of artists for commission. $100 of your pledge will go straight to the artist, who will create a custom 5" x 5" piece of artwork just for you, as you work with them to decide on the perfect subject (for example, one figure would be ideal, maximum two from the waist up, and they'd love to get your input on things and colors you like). Their artwork is featured below.   
How this works: Message us right away to reserve the artist of your choice! We can then put you in touch with that artist after the campaign ends to get you started. 
Three new artists added! littlemousedeer, Jennifer Chan, and Victoria Leeder are now available for commission - message us to claim your artist of choice!
 Stretch Goals: Additional wooden pins, digital goodies, stickers, and more! 
Wow, we reached funding within our first three days! Thank you SO SO MUCH for making that possible! We're so excited to already be able to share with you some of our extra goals we were hoping for, and maybe we'll even get to reveal more along the way!  
Stretch Goal #3 unlocked! All contributors receive a raise for their incredible work! Next stretch goal at $8K: Tote bags!
Goal unlocked: Baking tutorial video with Kirsten Petersen! Next: Contributor raises and a guided meditation audio recording!
Totes: 
At $8K, we'll unlock a tote bag design with a fictional Witches in Residence in the Evergreen Mountains design, so we can all imagine we had a wonderful summer at a witches' retreat in the woods!
We'd love to have even more Hazel merch this year, so we can go out with a bang! Of course, it's enough for us to just print this last issue, which is why we have a limited amount of extras included in our main goal this year. But as a last hurrah, we want to make all the fun witchy goods we've been dreaming of, so the more support we get, the more merch we can unlock with stretch goals along the way. Check out the reward tiers to see which one has the right combination of goodies for you.
More than the witch aesthetic, Hazel has heart. Every story and essay puts its heart on display, conjuring true connections with our readers. In reading Hazel, we hope to share a bit of ourselves, so that all of us, wherever we are, can feel seen by each other across any distance of time and space. The Spirit issue of Hazel is about the spirit within all of us, within each living thing, whatever you call it, and how we go about life respecting that quality of each being. For those of us in marginalized groups that feel that spirit within us denied, ignored, and trampled upon, this is a truly important and meaningful topic, and we can't wait to show you all the wonderful ways our creators have approached it.  
Sample pages by Libby Reed (left) and Lara Smith (right)
How is the money used?
By backing Hazel on Kickstarter, you're supporting the work and creative life of independent artists of all sorts. While the majority of the money from this budget goes toward our printing costs and rewards manufacturing, we strive to be able to give our contributors as much compensation for their wonderful work as possible. Honestly, with the amount of work and skill that our creators put into Hazel, their contributions are essentially a donation given for the love of Hazel, and I would value them at well over what I've been able to pay them. The more this campaign can raise, the more we will be able to pay our artists what they deserve. That's why we're so thankful to have such a loving and nurturing audience as the Hazel readership, who understands the importance of giving back to those who give us such incredible gifts. Thank you.
Sample pages by Syndey Anderson (left) and Lulu VanHoagland (right)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having produced Hazel for the past four years prior, we have learned so much about how to anticipate and work with risks and challenges. Our biggest risk is always not meeting our goal, and not being able to compensate our incredible contributors for their work. Next to that, if you ask any Kickstarter runner, you'll hear them say that shipping is a factor that is often very difficult to predict. Last year, we did lose some money on shipping to Canada that cost more than before. This is why we've never offered international shipping outside of North America, as frustrating as it is. We've done what we can to recalculate shipping in our cost calculations this year, but it is a challenge point for us with so many unknowns.

Another difficulty point is promotion. After the lessons learned from the first Kickstarter we launched, we've always managed to get funded by word of mouth and social media marketing, but part of the challenge of featuring creators with little to no audience yet is that our network has its limits. We're doing the best we can this year to reach for a higher goal for funding and reach for a wider audience at the same time, and with the help of our backers, we're hoping to surpass all previous goals as we grow even more this year than we have in the past.

We are confident that upon reaching our goal, we can get all the rewards out there to our backers in a timely manner, so if we can get the help we need, we're ready to supply the goods! Thank you so much for taking the time to support our book.

Thank you,
Lucy Kagan
Editor, Contributor, and Publisher of Hazel: A Witches' Lifestyle Zine

campaign.story:
Küche is a social business working in collaboration with people navigating the UK immigration system. Küche looks to celebrate different cultural cuisines, counteract negative attitudes and provide opportunities for us to be more socially and culturally informed, and react responsibly and with empathy to the wider world around us. 
From Greek broth to grief and loss, fishwives to folklore, pancakes to politics, Gaza to Glasgow, Tomorrow’s Kitchen: A Graphic Novel Cookbook is a unique collection of stories and recipes from novelists, food writers, cooks, playwrights and activists from all over the world.
Drawn by Shanghai based BAFTA-nominated illustrator Shuangshuang Hao, Tomorrow’s Kitchen invites you to the table, to taste some flavours of today’s world, and to think about how we might cook things up differently in tomorrow’s.
Brought to you by food-led social business Küche in partnership with Kitchen Press. 
Come take part in the Tomorrow's Kitchen campaign - we thank you for your support!
Send us an email (Deborah May - Küche Founder + Director) with any questions you may have about this project or a reward (or just to say hi!): hello@kueche.co.uk 
You can also follow us on Instagram to stay updated here. 
Tomorrow's Kitchen's Collective of Contributors include: Cook and researcher of Brazilian, Moroccan and French heritage Yasmine Sefraoui; creative Glasgow girls Kirsty Gibson and Emma Brown; Rwandan storyteller and performer Ery Nzaramba; Aberdonian novelist and memorist Kerry Hudson; Kampala based playwright and performer Asiimwe Deborah Kawe; Sheffield born cultural anthropologist Katie Catling; poet and creative writing teacher Rebecca Tantony; cookbook author, food educator and social entrepreneur Sumayya Usmani; Roma gypsy dancer and cook Sonia Michalewicz; currently making home in Glasgow Pakistani cook, mother and creative Shazia; Andrés Blanco - settled in 'Glesga' and passionate about cooking, renewable energy and Venezuela; Palestinian entrepreneur Lubna Said Alhajjar and Glasgow based Egyptian playwright and activist Sara Shaarawi.
Tomorrow's Kitchen has been supported by the Arts Development Scheme and Awards For All.

The Story:
This Deck was created for those who are Deaf, and those who are involved in the Deaf community or interested in American Sign Language.
After seeing that there is not strong representation of Deaf people and ASL in Western Esoteric-ism, I wanted to create something that serves as a positive reinforcement for the young, old and everyone in between to explore the "different" side of things. 
When I met my Partner Allie, I became interested in more things that were on the mystical side of the universe. Allie often read her fortunes and preached that the universe sent out good vibes if you shared those vibes back to the universe. Her black cat Luna is her spirit guide but they also guided me in making this deck! Thank you to you two for all the good vibes that I was then able to put into this deck.
The Inspiration of the Art:
The Rider Waite Smith(RWS) Deck is an iconic deck that many tarot users refer to, and many other card creators are also inspired by it. With that in mind, this deck also includes a mix of Deaf, ASL users, Diversity, and LGBT elements. It’s a deck for everyone to enjoy and cherish!
To learn more about the RWS deck, visit https://www.tarot.com/tarot/decks/rider
The Deck: 
The ASL Tarot is a complete 78-Card Deck
It will come in a gorgeous black box with a white logo on front which is also going to be screen printed by Inka's prints!
All decks purchased during Kickstarter will have the bonus of having the artist signature & number on the inside of the box.
The ASL Tarot will be supporting the environment and small businesses. The cards will be printed by a local company, and we are working towards environmentally friendly options, the boxes also will not be shrink wrapped.

updates.update_content: Everything is finally here and ready to be shipped! Thank you for all your patience and support throughout this process. Shipments are being sent by order of backer.

Happy holidays from the ASL Tarot!
The tarot book boxes continue to be delayed in California, but the manufacturer insists they will be cleared any day now. As soon as the shipment arrives, your order will be mailed to you. I personally apologize for any inconvenience this delay may have caused.
Thank you for your patience and have a safe new year!

Hi Everyone! 
I am working so hard to try to get the shipments ready and to you all before Christmas. Due to COVID, shipping has been a real challenge in the US. 

I'm still waiting on one set of shipments (14 boxes full of items- 1000 pieces) and apparently it's been in California since November 12, the manufacturer insists that this week will be the week for it to arrive.
The cards are printed! Look at that yellow trim and gold foil

I love the shirts that a Deaf-owned business just finished up! Thank you so much to Inka's
They are so comfortable and wash well! Minimal shrinkage, wear and tear! I'm thrilled to bring a product of this quality to those who ordered a shirt!
These cards are amazing! Great progress from a local Rochester business, Printroc!

Hi all! 

Just a quick update, I've already mentioned that I'm aiming to have everything in my hands and shipped out to customers in November. 
So far we're on track!

Wow! $30,000! You wanted more stretch goals and you've earned them! Now if we reach $40,000 everyone who ordered a deck (bronze and above) will receive this gorgeous mug perfect for drinking the included sample of tea from Good Sir Tea Co., another Deaf-owned business!

Hero Mode - Plumb the depths of special randomized dungeons with your chosen party and take on unique challenges not found elsewhere in Allraan. Plan your team wisely, as certain members will be stronger against specific foes. Be careful though, because your party members will tire over time, making fights harder as you explore deeper into the unknown!
Asynchronous Mode - At this stretch goal, you will be able to share your party and fortress town as AI-controlled data with other players, allowing them to battle your army without you even being online.
Fortress Town Asset Pack - This set of visual assets will allow you to customize your fortress in the style of a Japanese or Chinese castle, setting you apart from the rest! This is the third piece of FREE Digital DLC for backers.
Battle Defense Mode - At this stretch goal, invaders will periodically attack your Fortress Town as the story progresses. Build a Citadel to strengthen your walls, train defensive troops and develop weapons to protect your citizenry from those that would ransack your home.
Another Story: Seign - In this DLC side story, you will take control of Seign in an adventure told from the empire's point of view.
Participate in this social game with your fellow Kickstarter backers to help rebuild the town and unlock unique rewards for all backers. 
How do you play this social game? Click here to learn more. 
Let's rebuild the town!
 Tier 1:
 Post Office Rank 3! 4 Character Stickers, a jumbo Key Art sticker and stickers for the 10 stretch goal characters added to the Painter Job! This building is fully upgraded!
   Cotton Mill Rank 3! Sleeve & back design and glow in the dark ink added to the T-Shirt reward! This building is fully upgraded!
  Tier 2:
 Forge Rank 4! 7 order button badges along with character badges have been added to all tiers with the Sigil Button! This building is fully upgraded!
   Lumbermill Rank 4! Two Digital Wallpaper sets, a Papercraft character PDF and a Papercraft Fortress PDF have been added to every reward tier! This building is fully upgraded!
   Library Rank 3! The artbook page total has been increased to 108 pages and is now hard cover! This building is fully upgraded!
  Tier 3:
 Painter’s Gallery Rank 2! Reversible cover unlocked for the physical version, JP and US covers available in all regions, and Bad Western Cover Art unlocked! This building is fully upgraded! 
 Music Hall Rank 3! A 2nd disc and Sound Effect & Remix album has been added to the CD soundtrack, an extra LP has been added to the Vinyl Reward! This building has been fully upgraded!
  Tier 4:
 Jeweler Rank 3! The Jeweler Job Reward Set has been added to the campaign, and now offers 3 enamel pins & a key chain! This building is fully upgraded!
   Glass Blowing Factory Rank 4! A 2nd, 3rd, and 4th layer have been added to the acrylic diorama, and its size has been increased! This building is fully upgraded!
  Tier 5:
 Toy Shop Rank 2! Figures will now come packed with Special Edition Stickers & each figure box is now individually numbered!  Back the Kickstarter campaign. At 52,000 backers, the Toy Shop will be upgraded to Rank 3.
  The town has been rebuilt, but there’s still more work to do! Let’s continue to rank up these buildings and unlock additional rewards!
Eiyuden Chronicle’s deep story and dialogue is helmed by Yoshitaka Murayama, the master storyteller that wrote the scripts for both Suikoden I and II.
Watch the full town exploration video here:
PLAY

Eiyuden Chronicle has a vast world to explore, full of lush biomes, bustling towns, creepy caves, and quiet villages. Talk to townsfolk to learn more about the region, explore remote locations and fight secret bosses, or maybe just enjoy the gorgeous scenery.
The Waterstead of Quinja
The Seaside Cavern
Eiyuden Chronicle employs a traditional turn based RPG battle system where players take command of up to six individual units against either an army, or a single large creature. Choose commands for each of your characters, then watch them carry out your orders in full motion combat.
Watch the full boss fight video here:
PLAY

Over time, your heroes will also learn special AI abilities that they will perform on their own in battle, adding to the strategic element of combat. Characters will learn more AI commands as they grow stronger, and some characters will even link their AI commands together for added effects. Players will also be able to customize which AI commands their characters use in battle.
Through your adventures in the world of Eiyuden Chronicle, you will meet people from all walks of life, looking for something more. Whether it’s a fisherman, or a baker, or a brave warrior, each new addition to your army will bolster your ranks, making a worthy addition to your town.
Some of the kitties are very sleepy...
Eiyuden Chronicle isn’t just a classic-style JRPG. It’s also full of adorable cats. Cats as far as the eye can see. Cats meowing, cats napping, cats exploring the world. Cats, cats, cats. CATS! Meow!
This kitty looks like they're on patrol!
Music is an important aspect of JRPGs. This is why, in addition to internal composers, we’re also working with incredibly talented veteran composers.
 Motoi Sakuraba 
(Tales Of series, Shining Force 3, Golden Sun, Baten Kaitos)
Here's a sample of Motoi Sakuraba's fantastic music here:
Michiko Naruke 
(Wild ARMs 1-4).
Procyon Studio
Listen to a sample of Procyon Studio's (Mariam Abounnasr) work here: 
NOTE: Images in the Rewards section are not necessarily indicative of the final product, and are just representative.
The core gameplay experience, at your digital fingertips, on the platform of your choice!
Two copies of the epic JRPG for you and your cat, or on two different platforms of your choice, all to yourself.
For the old school gamer and collector alike, This boxed copy will both look great on your shelf, and house the game itself!
Two physical copies of the game, to do with however you wish. Want to give one to your cat? Want to put one in your collection and play the other one? Whatever you choose, this reward is for you.
This is your chance to get early access to the game, and not only take the battle system for a test drive before anyone else, but also offer your feedback to make it a better game! Due to logistical limitations, the beta will only be available on PC.
 A beautiful custom made button emblazoned with a sigil from the world of Eiyuden Chronicle.
The dulcet tones of Eiyuden Chronicle on physical CD, to enjoy whenever you like. Featuring music by Japanese music legends Motoi Sakuraba and Michiko Naruke.
A beautiful design straight from the world of Eiyuden Chronicle, screen-printed onto a T-shirt in the size you desire. 
Eiyuden Chronicle’s incredible JRPG soundtrack, etched forever into a limited edition collectible vinyl LP.

The art collector's dream, a hardcover book featuring unique behind the scenes concept and development artwork.
The Chef set comes with an apron, a set of digital recipes for delicious meals, and a measuring set to make sure each recipe comes out perfectly. 
The Painter set comes with a set of character stickers and a poster featuring art from the game.
The Jeweler comes with a selection of three beautiful Eiyuden-themed enamel pins with which to adorn your clothing.
The blacksmith set is a beautifully crafted 1:16 sized replica of the main character’s weapon, complete with a custom acrylic stand to display it on your shelf, your desk, or wherever you want!
The Farmer set comes with a beautiful tote bag to haul around whatever you like, and a journal to chronicle your daily adventures.
The Curator set features a multilayered acrylic diorama featuring the game’s main cast and the world of Eiyuden Chronicle.

Have your name featured in the game’s artbook as a staunch supporter of the Kickstarter campaign, forever cemented in the annals of history.
A beautiful poster featuring character art by Junko Kawano, and signed by the game’s four core members. Truly a collector’s item!
NOTE: The team reserves final say on creating these rewards, but we will make our best efforts to meet the backers’ expectations.
Name an in-game food ingredient. These items will appear in the game as ingredients for recipes, so let your imagination go wild!
Your name will be uttered by NPCs the player talks to in their travels. Will it be a congratulatory speech for your efforts on the battlefield, or will it be the eulogy at your funeral? That is for the cruel hand of fate to decide.
Hey, that's Komuta-san's kitty cat!
We know we said that Eiyuden Chronicle has more cats than you’ll know what to do with, but what’s one or two more? With this reward, you’ll be able to insert your adorable fur baby into the game, forever immortalized.
This very much not-a-cat is taking in the sun rays.
We don’t want other pet lovers missing out on all the fun. Don’t have a cat? That’s not a problem. Your little furry bundle of joy can still be a part of the world of Eiyuden Chronicle. 
The world of Eiyuden Chronicle is a vast one, but you can make a piece of it your own by helping us name a location in the world. Try to think of something cool.
Be a part of history by helping us design one of the many dark denizens that roam the land of Eiyuden Chronicle. Want to create a simple soldier, or a scary monster? The choice is up to you.
If you’d rather insert yourself into the game instead of your pet, we can do that too. Become one of the many people that live and breathe in the world of Eiyuden Chronicle. Become digitally immortal!
By adding $25 (2750 yen) on to your base pledge, you can add a beautifully woven 24"x18" cloth map of the world of Allraan to assist you through the dangerous world of Eiyuden Chronicle.
By adding $50 (5500 yen) onto your base pledge, you will get a set of five (5) premium Chibi-Chara figures. 

Message of Support
Koji Igarashi worked with us at our last company, and wanted to offer his support for the project.
PLAY

You helped him on his campaign, and he has never been happier, and we want to learn which areas to be wary of so that we can make this a successful campaign that you can be proud to support.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

campaign.story:
I Am Hexed: is a 4 part series full color, an original comic written by me, Kirsten Thompson.
Thanks to the magic of our amazing Kickstarter Coven our Issue #2 campaign was an amazing success!
This Kickstarter Campaign is for Issue #3. The third issue script is complete and with your help we can go full speed ahead to commission art production and make issue #3 a reality!
Thanks for checking out my Kickstarter and Joining the Movement!
I Am Hexed is a supernatural political thriller. There’s magic, mystery, personal drama, and an accidentally carnivorous plant.
Witches have been a part of the political fabric of Washington D.C. since it was founded. It’s only since the 1960s that witches stood together and fought to take back the word “Hexed”. A movement was ignited when witches came out of the shadows and proudly showed off their broomsticks. 
Now with the struggle for equality ongoing, Charlotte "Charlie" Helm, a junior staff member for Senator Royce, has been thrust into the murky and dangerous waters of political games between witches and their adversaries. Charlie goes on the run to find out who's behind it with her ex-girlfriend Jaya and her friend Florence, who is a witch well versed in science-magic. 
Will Charlie find out why the witch authorities are after her before they find her?!

Kirsten Thompson is a comic writer and editor based in the Pacific Northwest. In addition to being the creator and writer of I AM HEXED, she has been a consultant on such comics as Kim & Kim volume 2, a staff writer at The MNT and her writing has also appeared in Teen Vogue, Femsplain and Women Write About Comics.
Amagoia Agirre is a freelance illustrator and comic artist based in Spain. She is currently working on various projects including illustrated books, tabletop rpgs, and short comics. If she is not locked up in her studio drawing you’ll probably find her walking in the woods accompanied by her dog Iggy.
Little Corvus is a transmasc Latinx comic artist and illustrator based in Seattle. They are an Eisner, Ringo and Ignatz nominated artist who has worked with Dark Horse, Scholastic, Harper Collins, and more. They love witches, street fashion, and positive, diverse stories.
Paulina Ganucheau is a comic artist and illustrator based wherever her computer lives. She is the creator of Lemon Bird with an original GN out in 2021 and co-creator of Zodiac Starforce published by Dark Horse Comics. Her hobbies include watching pro-wrestling, cloud photography, and following cats on Instagram.
Taylor is a comic book lettering professional and owner of Ghost Glyph Studios. As a staff letterer at DC, he lettered titles such as Red Hood and The Outlaws, Constantine, Bodies, CMYK, and New Suicide Squad. Prior to this, Taylor was credited on numerous titles for Marvel as a production artist. He is currently working on a new batch of creator-owned titles, such as Interceptor: Reactor and Cult Classic: Return to Whisper (Vault Comics), Atomahawk, Dark Fang (Image), and Babyteeth (Aftershock).
Yoshi Yoshitani has always been inspired by cultures, histories, mythologies, and patterns from around the world. She uses this inspiration to fuel her concepts and illustrations. 
Rian Gonzales (a.k.a. Rianbowart) is a Freelance Illustrator from the Philippines who is known for her distinctive, vibrant, candy-themed pieces. Most of her works depict women in trendy fashion, delectable sweets, and neon colors. She has done cover works for international comic companies such as Marvel Comics (Marvel Rising #1 connecting covers, X-Men, Spider-Girls), Archie Comics (Betty and Veronica, Josie and the Pussycats), IDW Publishing (Jem and the Holograms), and Valiant Comics (Faith). Her work was also featured in Udon’s Capcom Fighting Tribute art book. She is a contributing artist and writer for the Philippine Daily Inquirer youth section. During her off times, she enjoys being a deserted Island dweller in Animal Crossing.
Meredith does comics. You may have heard of some (Hinges, Hopeless Savages V4, Heart in a Box). She lives in a constant state of exhaustion. If spotted in the wild, please feed.
Born in Argentina, Natalia, (aka Naty), is a globally-minded free-spirited creative raised in Queens and now based in Brooklyn. She has earned her Bachelor of Arts in Graphic Design & Fine Art in 2006 and has since studied the ancient art of henna. Through an equally thorough study of entrepreneurship business, Naty by Nature emerged to become one of the most sought-after henna businesses in the NYC Metro and Tri-State area.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The production and project management of this title is “in-house” and comfortably in my control, eliminating many variables that could cause delays. That being said, some of the things that rely on external production (The manufacture of rewards, logistics of packing & shipping individual rewards) may cause some delays. 

Depending on the print quantity, we may choose to print our books in Canada or overseas. If so, there could be problems such as our books being held in customs, and longer shipping times. I have spent the past eight months planning and refining this project.

I have accounted for these potential problems and worked them into our schedule. 
Everyone will be updated every step of the way, throughout the entire production process. Of course, we will notify you of any setbacks that may arise. 

Thank you for casting your bit of magic on I Am Hexed!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
